title: Deep Bowl (Donburi) with Spiraling Decoration on the Interior and Chatter Mark Decoration on the Exterior
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of the Pucker Gallery, Boston, in honor of Johnny and Terry de Gunzburg
medium: Onda ware, 'zogan' technique: light gray stoneware with pale olive glaze over brush-applied white slip on the interior and over white slip brushed over chatter marks on the exterior; with three- (or four-?) character stamp of the Onda kilns impressed on the base

images.copyright: President and Fellows of Harvard College
